sentences.sContent: The flagella rotate, pushing the bacteria through the water.
sentences.sContent_eng: The flagella rotate, pushing the bacteria through the water.
sentences.sCn: 鞭毛的旋转可以推动细菌在水中行进。

sentences.sContent: Bacteria under the microscope, even those with no flagella, often bounce about in the water.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bacteria under the microscope, even those with no flagella, often bounce about in the water.
sentences.sCn: 在显微镜下，细菌，甚至包括那些没有鞭毛的细菌，经常在水中跳来跳去。

sentences.sContent: Thus 15th Century tree rings become an argument against the Kyoto Protocol, just as bacterial flagella are whipped into service when discussing the role of religion in public life.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus 15th Century tree rings become an argument against the Kyoto Protocol, just as bacterial flagella are whipped into service when discussing the role of religion in public life.
sentences.sCn: 因此，15世纪树的年轮 成为反对京都协议的争论，就好像当讨论到宗教在公众生活中的角色时，细菌鞭毛被迅速投入使用。
